scripts.dev: rm -rf dist; mkdir -p dist/puzzles; cp -r puzzles dist/; parcel index.html
scripts.upload-code: rm -rf dist; parcel build index.html --public-url /puzzles/3doku && rsync -r 'dist/' 'andrewtaylor_andrewt@ssh.phx.nearlyfreespeech.net:/home/public/www.andrewt.net/puzzles/3doku'
scripts.upload-test: rm -rf dist; parcel build index.html --public-url /puzzles/3doku-beta && rsync -r 'dist/' 'andrewtaylor_andrewt@ssh.phx.nearlyfreespeech.net:/home/public/www.andrewt.net/puzzles/3doku-beta'
